turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order four pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like for your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pepperoni and sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for all 4?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: for all three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you only wanted 3 pizzas or 4?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted three pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you are ordering 3 large pepperoni and sausage pizzas, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I would like a special instruction like they should be gluten-free crusts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, bella luna's charges an additional $1 for gluten free crust bringing your total to $75, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery, or dine in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a delivery, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that your total does not include tip.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. That will be fine. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered within 50 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thanks very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, not at all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.
